wallet.createNewMnemonicOrKeylessWallet: Create a new mnemonic or keyless wallet
wallet.connectHardwareWalletByQr: Connect hardware wallet by scanning QR code
wallet.trackWalletAssets: Track wallet assets via wallet address
wallet.importExistingWallet: Import existing wallet using mnemonic, private key, or backup
wallet.supportsHundredsOfNetworks: Supports private keys for hundreds of networks
wallet.mnemonicHint: Separate mnemonic words with spaces. Supports importing 12 or 24-word mnemonics or private keys from any wallet.
wallet.securityWarning: We do not store your mnemonic or private key. If they are leaked, your assets may be lost. Please keep them safe.
wallet.safetyAdvice: It is recommended to write down or scan your mnemonic/private key. Avoid copying and pasting from untrusted third-party apps to prevent scams.
wallet.handwriteRecommended: It is recommended to write it down by hand
wallet.mnemonicIsPassword: Your mnemonic is equivalent to your wallet password
wallet.mnemonicEqualsOwnership: Having the mnemonic means owning the assets. If leaked, assets cannot be recovered
wallet.handwriteOrColdWallet: Write it down by hand or store it on an offline device such as a cold wallet
wallet.copyOrScreenshotRisk: Copying or taking screenshots may cause your mnemonic to leak
wallet.storeMnemonicSafely: Keep your mnemonic in a safe place
wallet.lossIsIrrecoverable: If lost, your assets cannot be recovered
wallet.personalResponsibility: You are solely responsible for your mnemonic. Please back it up! Once lost, your assets cannot be recovered!
wallet.verifyMnemonicTip: Please verify the mnemonic in order
wallet.confirm_add_solana_token: Are you sure you want to add the $token token?
wallet.confirm_delete_solana_token: Are you sure you want to delete the $token token?
wallet.no_wallet_address_to_backup: No wallet address to back up
wallet.wallet_address_not_found_local: Wallet address not found locally, unable to mark as backed up

wallet.please_check_token_address: Please make sure you entered the correct token address
wallet.unknown_error_please_try_again_later: Unknown error, please try again later
wallet.private_key_warning: Make sure you are not being recorded and do not share it with anyone.
wallet.ensure_not_being_watched: Please ensure you are not being watched or recorded
wallet.tipFillAddress: Fill in added address when sending
wallet.scanTip: Scan to detect address, connect DApp or pay merchant
